function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Shortage of personal protection equipment supply","Impact":"Increased risk of COVID-19 exposure for construction workers","Mitigation":"Increase production and distribution of personal protective equipment","Technologies":"Advanced inventory management systems, 3D printing for PPE manufacturing","People":"Construction workers, managers, engineers","Owner":"Government, construction companies"},{"Description":"Complying with social distancing mandates on construction sites","Impact":"Potential spread of COVID-19 among workers due to close proximity","Mitigation":"Implement strict social distancing protocols, reorganize workspaces","Technologies":"Sensors for monitoring distancing, scheduling software for staggered shifts","People":"Construction workers, site managers, engineers","Owner":"Construction companies, site managers"},{"Description":"Shortage of skilled workers and materials","Impact":"Project delays and potential compromise of safety and quality standards","Mitigation":"Invest in training programs, diversify suppliers, and streamline supply chain","Technologies":"Online training platforms, supply chain management software","People":"Construction workers, project managers","Owner":"Construction companies, suppliers"}]}
